Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.4 Cittasampayuttaduka » 10.4.7 Pañhāvāra » 10.4.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 10.4.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Mahantaraduka
Cittasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
182.
2759Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta (sabbattha satta), nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
